sections.heading: and files; destruction; applicable to national banks
sections.text: Sections 8-170 to 8-174, so far as may be permitted by the laws of the United States, shall apply to the records and files of national banks.SourceLaws 1949, c. 10, ยง 5, p. 72;R.R.S.1943, ยง 8-1,115;Laws 1963, c. 29, ยง 74, p. 163;Laws 2017, LB140,
